page.title: 16Music people like
page.content: We did a survey on what{music people {like.}We asked{35 children, parents {and grandparents.}We went to an old peoples home, we went door to door, then we asked children. The old people didn't play instruments at school. Some of the children play instruments, mostly the girls. The girls played recorders. The boys don't seem to play instruments as much. Sometimes children get together and make little tunes at dinnertimes and playtimes. Only 3 parents played instruments, a guitar, cello and recorder. Nowadays more people seem to play instruments than they did when our grandparents were small children. The grandparents and parents favorite inst. were mainly piano but the kids liked drums, synthesisers and recorders.
